pr_title: Make sure to set previous active generation when one exists

timeline.message: Make sure to set previous active generation when one exists

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps we should consider to stop using 'generation' if it really is the sessionId.
timeline.author: gjoranv

replies.bodyText: Agreed, it's just an implementation detail that they are equal. I'll try to improve this in a later PR.
replies.author: hmusum
